entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Periods of light snow beginning before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 6.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets ending after midnight then mainly cloudy. Risk of freezing rain in the evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 23 December 2022
